mod.name: The Blade Gunner
mod.credits:
BaseMod, ModTheSpire: Kiooeht and other contributors.
Spire Exporter: twanvl.
English translation refine: Stanek.
mod.description: Add new character blade gunner to Slay the Spire.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Reload
cards.description:
bladegunner:Load ALL.
Gain 5 Block.
Whenever you use ammo, put this card into your hand and Retain.

cards.name: Reload+
cards.description:
bladegunner:Load ALL.
Gain 8 Block.
Whenever you use ammo, put this card into your hand and Retain.

cards.name: Revolver
cards.description:
At the start of combat, if no gun is equipped, play this card.
bladegunner:Equip bladegunner:Revolver.

cards.name: Revolver+
cards.description:
At the start of combat, if no gun is equipped, play this card.
bladegunner:Equip bladegunner:Revolver+.

cards.name: Shoot
cards.description:
{@@}bladegunner:Shoot !bladegunner:var.ShootCount! time{!bladegunner:var.ShootCount!|0,>1=s}.
bladegunner:Exchange.

cards.name: Shoot+
cards.description:
{@@}bladegunner:Shoot !bladegunner:var.ShootCount! time{!bladegunner:var.ShootCount!|0,>1=s}.
Deals 4 more damage.
bladegunner:Exchange.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Golden Bullet
cards.description:
This card is treated as *Little *Bullet.
bladegunner:Load 1.
Gain [E] [E].
Retain.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Golden Bullet+
cards.description:
This card is treated as *Little *Bullet.
bladegunner:Load 1.
Gain [E] [E] [E].
Retain.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Jam
cards.description:
Unplayable.
When you bladegunner:Shoot, Exhaust this and bladegunner:Unload 1.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Little Bullet
cards.description:
bladegunner:Load 1.
Gain [E].
Retain.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Little Bullet+
cards.description:
bladegunner:Load 1.
Gain [E] [E].
Retain.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Ammo Box
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Add 2 *Little *Bullet into your hand.

cards.name: Ammo Box+
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.
Add 2 *Little *Bullet into your hand.

cards.name: Bandolier
cards.description: Gain Block equal to magazine capacity plus 2.

cards.name: Bandolier+
cards.description: Gain Block equal to magazine capacity plus 2.

cards.name: Dual Shot
cards.description:
If you have 2 ammo in the magazine,
gain [E] [E].
{@@}bladegunner:Shoot !bladegunner:var.ShootCount! time{!bladegunner:var.ShootCount!|0,>1=s}.

cards.name: Dual Shot+
cards.description:
If you have 2 ammo in the magazine,
gain [E] [E].
{@@}bladegunner:Shoot !bladegunner:var.ShootCount! time{!bladegunner:var.ShootCount!|0,>1=s}.
Deal 150% damage.

cards.name: Emergency Reload
cards.description:
bladegunner:Load ALL.
Gain [E].
Add a *Jam into your discard pile.

cards.name: Emergency Reload+
cards.description:
bladegunner:Load ALL.
Gain [E].
Draw 1 card.
Add a *Jam into your discard pile.

cards.name: Grenade
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Deal 6 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Grenade+
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage.
Deal 8 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Gunsmoke
cards.description:
bladegunner:Unload 5.
Apply bladegunner:Burning equal to amount of removed ammo.
Target keeps bladegunner:Burning this turn.

cards.name: Gunsmoke+
cards.description:
bladegunner:Unload 5.
Apply bladegunner:Burning equal to amount of removed ammo.
Target keeps bladegunner:Burning this turn.

cards.name: Gunstock Strike
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Deal 3 additional damage for each of equipped bladegunner:Guns.
bladegunner:Exchange.

cards.name: Gunstock Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Deal 4 additional damage for each of equipped bladegunner:Guns.
bladegunner:Exchange.

cards.name: Headshot
cards.description:
{@@}bladegunner:Shoot !bladegunner:var.ShootCount! time{!bladegunner:var.ShootCount!|0,>1=s}.
Deal 130% damage.

cards.name: Headshot+
cards.description:
bladegunner:Shoot !bladegunner:var.ShootCount! time.
Deal [#7fff00]170%[] damage.

cards.name: Ignite
cards.description:
Apply 4 bladegunner:Burning.
bladegunner:Detonate.
Deal damage equal to amount of bladegunner:Burning.

cards.name: Ignite+
cards.description:
Apply 7 bladegunner:Burning.
bladegunner:Detonate.
Deal damage equal to amount of bladegunner:Burning.

cards.name: Low Ammo Anxiety
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
If you have less than half of the ammo in magazine, deal 8 damage again.

cards.name: Low Ammo Anxiety+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
If you have less than half of the ammo in magazine, deal 11 damage again.

cards.name: Preparing Stance
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
Next turn, gain [E].
bladegunner:Exchange.

cards.name: Preparing Stance+
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Next turn, gain [E].
bladegunner:Exchange.

cards.name: Rash'oot
cards.description:
{@@}bladegunner:Shoot !bladegunner:var.ShootCount! time{!bladegunner:var.ShootCount!|0,>1=s}.
Add a *Jam into your draw pile.

cards.name: Rash'oot+
cards.description:
{@@}bladegunner:Shoot !bladegunner:var.ShootCount! time{!bladegunner:var.ShootCount!|0,>1=s}.
Add a *Jam into your draw pile.

cards.name: Reloading Practice
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
Add a *Little *Bullet to draw pile.
Exhaust a random Status in draw pile.

cards.name: Reloading Practice+
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Add an Upgraded *Little *Bullet to draw pile.
Exhaust a random Status in draw pile.

cards.name: Rolling Slash
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
Gain 6 Block.
bladegunner:Exchange.

cards.name: Rolling Slash+
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Gain 9 Block.
bladegunner:Exchange.

cards.name: Russian Roulette
cards.description: Can only be played if you equip Revolver with 1 ammo. bladegunner:Exchange to it. bladegunner:Shoot a random enemy. Deal 40 damage.

cards.name: Russian Roulette+
cards.description: Can only be played if you equip Revolver with 1 ammo. bladegunner:Exchange to it. bladegunner:Shoot a random enemy. Deal 55 damage.

cards.name: Smoke Bomb
cards.description:
bladegunner:Exchange.
bladegunner:Load ALL.
Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Smoke Bomb+
cards.description:
bladegunner:Exchange.
bladegunner:Load ALL.
Gain 11 Block.

cards.name: Spinning Slash
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.
Draw cards equal to count of enemies.

cards.name: Spinning Slash+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage to ALL enemies.
Draw cards equal to count of enemies, at least 2 cards.

cards.name: Sticky Bullets
cards.description: Replace ALL bullets in magazine with bladegunner:Sticky_bullets.

cards.name: Sticky Bullets+
cards.description: Replace ALL bullets in magazine with bladegunner:Sticky_bullets.

cards.name: Accurate Shoot
cards.description:
{@@}bladegunner:Shoot !bladegunner:var.ShootCount! time{!bladegunner:var.ShootCount!|0,>1=s}.
Deals 1 more damage for each bladegunner:Shooting_card you have played in this combat.

cards.name: Accurate Shoot+
cards.description:
{@@}bladegunner:Shoot !bladegunner:var.ShootCount! time{!bladegunner:var.ShootCount!|0,>1=s}.
Deals 2 more damage for each bladegunner:Shooting_card you have played in this combat.

cards.name: Aim Weakness
cards.description:
{@@}bladegunner:Shoot !bladegunner:var.ShootCount! time{!bladegunner:var.ShootCount!|0,>1=s}.
bladegunner:Detonate.
Deals 2 more damage.

cards.name: Aim Weakness+
cards.description:
bladegunner:Detonate.
{@@}bladegunner:Shoot !bladegunner:var.ShootCount! time{!bladegunner:var.ShootCount!|0,>1=s}.
Deals 2 more damage.

cards.name: Airdrop
cards.description: At the start of your turn, draw an additional card and reduce its cost by 1 in this turn.

cards.name: Airdrop+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, draw an additional card and reduce its cost by 1 in this turn.

cards.name: Armory
cards.description:
Add a random bladegunner:Gun_card into your hand and reduce its cost by 1.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Armory+
cards.description:
Choose 1 of 2 random bladegunner:Gun_cards to add into your hand and reduce its cost by 1.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Backup
cards.description: Choose a card in your hand. Add a copy of that card into your hand. The copy is Exhausted when played.

cards.name: Backup+
cards.description: Choose a card in your hand. Add 2 copies of that card into your hand. The copies are Exhausted when played.

cards.name: Ballistic Vest
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Take half damage from Attacks until your next turn.

cards.name: Ballistic Vest+
cards.description:
Gain 11 Block.
Take half damage from Attacks until your next turn.

cards.name: Barrage of Bullets
cards.description:
bladegunner:Shoot N times, where N is count of *Little *Bullet in hand.
Exhaust a *Little *Bullet.

cards.name: Barrage of Bullets+
cards.description: bladegunner:Shoot N times, where N is count of *Little *Bullet in hand.

cards.name: Be Well-Armed
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
Gain 3 additional Block for each of equipped bladegunner:Guns.
bladegunner:Exchange.

cards.name: Be Well-Armed+
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Gain 4 additional Block for each of equipped bladegunner:Guns.
bladegunner:Exchange.

cards.name: Blade Gun
cards.description: bladegunner:Equip bladegunner:Blade_gun.

cards.name: Blade Gun+
cards.description: bladegunner:Equip bladegunner:Blade_gun+.

cards.name: Bullets in Sand
cards.description:
Put 2 *Little *Bullet into your hand at the start of next X turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bullets in Sand+
cards.description:
Put 2 *Little *Bullet into your hand at the start of next X+1 turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Combat Memories
cards.description:
Put a random bladegunner:Shooting_card from discard pile into your hand.
bladegunner:Exchange.

cards.name: Combat Memories+
cards.description:
Put 2 random bladegunner:Shooting_cards from discard pile into your hand.
bladegunner:Exchange.

cards.name: Crazy Shoot
cards.description:
{@@}bladegunner:Shoot !bladegunner:var.ShootCount! time{!bladegunner:var.ShootCount!|0,>1=s}.
Deal 60% damage.

cards.name: Crazy Shoot+
cards.description:
{@@}bladegunner:Shoot !bladegunner:var.ShootCount! time{!bladegunner:var.ShootCount!|0,>1=s}.
Deal 60% damage.

cards.name: Dagger in Bullets
cards.description:
Deal 18 damage.
Costs 1 less [E] each time you bladegunner:Load ALL.

cards.name: Dagger in Bullets+
cards.description:
Deal 23 damage.
Costs 1 less [E] each time you bladegunner:Load ALL.

cards.name: Disassemble
cards.description:
You may Exhaust a bladegunner:Gun_card. Gain [E] equal to its cost plus 1.
Draw 1 card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Disassemble+
cards.description:
You may Exhaust a bladegunner:Gun_card. Gain [E] equal to its cost plus 1.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Eject
cards.description:
bladegunner:Exchange.
Empty magazine.
Add 2 *Little *Bullet to hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Eject+
cards.description:
bladegunner:Exchange.
Empty magazine.
Add 3 *Little *Bullet to hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fire Blade
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
Apply 2 bladegunner:Burning.

cards.name: Fire Blade+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Apply 2 bladegunner:Burning.

cards.name: Flamethrower
cards.description: bladegunner:Equip bladegunner:Flamethrower.

cards.name: Flamethrower+
cards.description: bladegunner:Equip bladegunner:Flamethrower+.

cards.name: Flashbang
cards.description:
Apply 3 Weak to ALL enemies.
Gain 3 Dexterity.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Flashbang+
cards.description:
Apply 4 Weak to ALL enemies.
Gain 4 Dexterity.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Gun as Shield
cards.description:
Gain block equal to base damage of your current bladegunner:Gun.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Gun as Shield+
cards.description:
Gain block equal to base damage of your current bladegunner:Gun plus 4.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Gust
cards.description: At the end of turn, enemies keep 50% amount of bladegunner:Burning.

cards.name: Gust+
cards.description: At the end of turn, enemies keep 75% amount of bladegunner:Burning.

cards.name: Increase Caliber
cards.description:
Gain 2 Strength.
Gain 1 additional Strength if magazine is not empty.
Empty magazine.

cards.name: Increase Caliber+
cards.description:
Gain 3 Strength.
Gain 1 additional Strength if magazine is not empty.
Empty magazine.

cards.name: Laser Pistol
cards.description: bladegunner:Equip bladegunner:Laser_pistol.

cards.name: Laser Pistol+
cards.description: bladegunner:Equip bladegunner:Laser_pistol+.

cards.name: Machine Gun
cards.description: bladegunner:Equip bladegunner:Machine_gun.

cards.name: Machine Gun+
cards.description: bladegunner:Equip bladegunner:Machine_gun+.

cards.name: Mad Blade
cards.description:
Gain 2 temporary Strength.
This turn, each time you play a bladegunner:Non-shooting_Attack, keep 1 Strength.

cards.name: Mad Blade+
cards.description:
Gain 4 temporary Strength.
This turn, each time you play a bladegunner:Non-shooting_Attack, keep 1 Strength.

cards.name: Magazine Expansion
cards.description:
Increase magazine capacity by 3.
bladegunner:Load 3.

cards.name: Magazine Expansion+
cards.description:
Innate.
Increase magazine capacity by 3.
bladegunner:Load 3.

cards.name: Master of Guns
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
Draw an additional card for each equipped bladegunner:Gun.

cards.name: Master of Guns+
cards.description:
Draw 3 cards.
Draw an additional card for each equipped bladegunner:Gun.

cards.name: Offense to Defense
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
Gain additional 3 Block for each Attack played in this turn.

cards.name: Offense to Defense+
cards.description:
Gain 9 Block.
Gain additional 5 Block for each Attack played in this turn.

cards.name: Pierce
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Apply 2 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Pierce+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Apply 3 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Quick Draw
cards.description:
{@@}bladegunner:Shoot !bladegunner:var.ShootCount! time{!bladegunner:var.ShootCount!|0,>1=s}.
Deal 30% damage.

cards.name: Quick Draw+
cards.description:
bladegunner:Shoot !bladegunner:var.ShootCount! times.
Deal [#7fff00]50%[] damage.

cards.name: Rocket Launcher
cards.description: bladegunner:Equip bladegunner:Rocket_launcher.

cards.name: Rocket Launcher+
cards.description: bladegunner:Equip bladegunner:Rocket_launcher+.

cards.name: Shell Defense
cards.description: Whenever ammo is used or removed, gain 1 Block.

cards.name: Shell Defense+
cards.description: Whenever ammo is used or removed, gain 2 Block.

cards.name: Shooting Prepare
cards.description:
bladegunner:Load ALL.
Draw 2 card.

cards.name: Shooting Prepare+
cards.description:
bladegunner:Load ALL.
Draw 3 card.

cards.name: Shotgun
cards.description: bladegunner:Equip bladegunner:Shotgun.

cards.name: Shotgun+
cards.description: bladegunner:Equip bladegunner:Shotgun+.

cards.name: Sniper Rifle
cards.description: bladegunner:Equip bladegunner:Sniper_rifle.

cards.name: Sniper Rifle+
cards.description: bladegunner:Equip bladegunner:Sniper_rifle.

cards.name: Special Vulnerary
cards.description:
Heal HP equal to 2 multiply number of *Little *Bullet in hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Special Vulnerary+
cards.description:
Heal HP equal to 3 multiply number of *Little *Bullet in hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Speed Shooting
cards.description: bladegunner:Shooting_cards attack 2 more times in this turn.

cards.name: Speed Shooting+
cards.description: bladegunner:Shooting_cards attack 3 more times in this turn.

cards.name: Spinning Shoot
cards.description:
{@@}bladegunner:Shoot ALL enemies !bladegunner:var.ShootCount! time{!bladegunner:var.ShootCount!|0,>1=s}.
Deals 3 less damage.
Shuffle a *Jam into your draw pile.

cards.name: Spinning Shoot+
cards.description:
bladegunner:Shoot ALL enemies !bladegunner:var.ShootCount! times.
Deals [#7fff00]1[] less damage.
Shuffle a *Jam into your draw pile.

cards.name: Tactical Retreat
cards.description:
Gain 4 Block.
Your next bladegunner:Shooting_card deals 3 more damage.
bladegunner:Exchange.

cards.name: Tactical Retreat+
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Your next bladegunner:Shooting_card deals 3 more damage.
bladegunner:Exchange.

cards.name: Thrift
cards.description: Whenever a *Jam is Exhausted, put a *Little *Bullet into your hand.

cards.name: Thrift+
cards.description: Whenever a *Jam is Exhausted, put a *Little *Bullet into your hand.

cards.name: Throw Sand
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Apply 2 Weak.
bladegunner:Exchange.

cards.name: Throw Sand+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Apply 3 Weak.
bladegunner:Exchange.

cards.name: Burning Land
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage to ALL enemies.
Apply 5 bladegunner:Burning.
Targets keep bladegunner:Burning this turn.

cards.name: Burning Land+
cards.description:
Deal 18 damage to ALL enemies.
Apply 5 bladegunner:Burning.
Targets keep bladegunner:Burning this turn.

cards.name: Camouflage
cards.description:
Gain 2 Intangible.
Cannot play Attacks whose damage are less than 22 in 2 turns.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Camouflage+
cards.description:
Gain 3 Intangible.
Cannot play Attacks whose damage are less than 22 in 3 turns.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Combination Attack
cards.description: Whenever you play a bladegunner:Non-shooting_Attack, bladegunner:Shoot 1 time, which deals 50% damage.

cards.name: Combination Attack+
cards.description:
Innate.
Whenever you play a bladegunner:Non-shooting_Attack, bladegunner:Shoot 1 time, which deals 50% damage.

cards.name: Dimensional Shoot
cards.description:
{@@}bladegunner:Shoot !bladegunner:var.ShootCount! time{!bladegunner:var.ShootCount!|0,>1=s}.
If Fatal, permanently increase this card's Attack count by 1.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Dimensional Shoot+
cards.description:
{@@}bladegunner:Shoot !bladegunner:var.ShootCount! time{!bladegunner:var.ShootCount!|0,>1=s}.
If Fatal, permanently increase this card's Attack count by 1.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Drop Gun
cards.description:
Discard any bladegunner:Gun.
In this and next turn, gain [E] and draw cards equal to count of discarded cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Drop Gun+
cards.description:
Discard any bladegunner:Gun.
In this and next turn, gain [E] and draw cards equal to 1 plus count of discarded cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Exhausting Strike
cards.description:
Deal 30 damage.
Empty magazine and gain 1 Strength for each removed ammo, at most 9 Strength.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Exhausting Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 40 damage.
Empty magazine and gain 1 Strength for each removed ammo, at most 9 Strength.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Hot Shells
cards.description: Deal 2 damage to ALL enemies whenever ammo is used.

cards.name: Hot Shells+
cards.description: Deal 3 damage to ALL enemies whenever ammo is used.

cards.name: Infinite Ammo
cards.description:
bladegunner:Shooting doesn't use ammo in this turn.
bladegunner:Exchange.

cards.name: Infinite Ammo+
cards.description:
bladegunner:Shooting doesn't use ammo in this turn.
bladegunner:Exchange.

cards.name: Mad Gun
cards.description:
bladegunner:Shoot X times.
bladegunner:Auto_reload.

cards.name: Mad Gun+
cards.description:
bladegunner:Shoot X times.
Deals 3 more damage.
bladegunner:Auto_reload.

cards.name: Mecha Form
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Effect of this card depends on current bladegunner:Gun.

cards.name: Mecha Form+
cards.description: Effect of this card depends on current bladegunner:Gun.

cards.name: Pursue
cards.description: If you play bladegunner:Shooting_cards this turn, gain [E] next turn.

cards.name: Pursue+
cards.description: If you play bladegunner:Shooting_cards this turn, gain [E] next turn.

cards.name: Ricochet
cards.description: Deals same amount of damage to random enemy each time you bladegunner:Shoot. Lose this effect at the end of the turn it's triggered.

cards.name: Ricochet+
cards.description: Deals same amount of damage to random enemy each time you bladegunner:Shoot. Lose this effect at the end of the turn it's triggered.

cards.name: Sandstorm
cards.description:
Deal 20 damage to ALL enemies.
Add 2 *Jam into your hand and Retain them.

cards.name: Sandstorm+
cards.description:
Deal 26 damage to ALL enemies.
Add 2 *Jam into your hand and Retain them.

cards.name: Supplement
cards.description:
bladegunner:Exchange.
bladegunner:Load ALL.
If magazine is empty, draw 2 cards,
gain [E] [E].

cards.name: Supplement+
cards.description:
bladegunner:Exchange.
bladegunner:Load ALL.
If magazine is empty, draw 3 cards,
gain [E] [E] [E].

relics.name: Old Revolver
relics.description: The first time you play a bladegunner:Shooting_card each combat, add Little Bullet into your hand.

relics.name: Lucky Bullet
relics.description: Whenever you use 6 ammo, add Little Bullet into your hand. This effect can only be triggered once per turn.

relics.name: Empty Cylinder
relics.description: If magazine capacity is greater than 1, double damage from the last ammo in magazine.

relics.name: Gun Oil
relics.description: Jam is playable. When it's played, Exhaust it and draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: A gun that is not carefully maintained is dangerous.

relics.name: Bayonet
relics.description: When you play a bladegunner:Non-shooting_Attack, your next bladegunner:Shooting_card deals 2 more damage.
relics.flavorText: It's blade, and part of a gun.

relics.name: Sweet Rain
relics.description: It seems that you are looking for it. You should take this and leave the spire.
relics.flavorText: It has magical power of summoning thunder and rain.

relics.name: Golden Revolver
relics.description: Replaces Old Revolver. The first time you play a bladegunner:Shooting_card each combat, add Golden Bullet into your hand. At the end of combat, gain 12 Gold if Golden Bullet is in your hand.
relics.flavorText: One of the best guns in my collection.

relics.name: Runic Holster
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. When you bladegunner:Equip a gun, its magazine is empty.
relics.flavorText: This make me feel I can draw my gun even faster.

relics.name: Tiny Oasis
relics.description: At the start of every 3 turns, choose a Skill card from draw pile and put it into your hand.

relics.name: Rifling Barrel
relics.description: At the start of first 3 turns, gain effect randomly from one of Infinite Ammo, Ricochet and Speed Shooting.

potions.name: Bullets in a Jar
potions.description: Add 2 Little Bullet to your hand.

keywords.name: Bladegunner:Auto Reload
keywords.description:
If magazine is empty during shooting, reduce Attack count by 1, then fill magazine up with ammo.
Attack count limitation of Sniper rifle doesn't take effect.

keywords.name: Bladegunner:Blade Gun
keywords.description:
Base damage: 8.
Shooting cards are treated as Non-shooting Attacks. They deals damage equal to base damage of this gun multiply Attack count.

keywords.name: Bladegunner:Blade Gun+
keywords.description:
Base damage: 12.
Shooting cards are treated as Non-shooting Attacks. They deals damage equal to base damage of this gun multiply Attack count.

keywords.name: Bladegunner:Gun Card
keywords.description: Gun cards are Power cards that contains Equip in description.

keywords.name: Bladegunner:Laser Pistol
keywords.description:
Magazine capacity: 7.
Base damage: 3.
Increase base damage by 1 for each ammo in magazine.

keywords.name: Bladegunner:Laser Pistol+
keywords.description:
Magazine capacity: 7.
Base damage: 5.
Increase base damage by 3 for every 2 ammo in magazine.

keywords.name: Bladegunner:Machine Gun
keywords.description:
Magazine capacity: 12.
Base damage: 5.
Double attack count of Shooting cards.
Gain double capacity from Magazine expansion.
Gain double attack count from Speed shooting.
Half effect of Strength on Shooting cards.

keywords.name: Bladegunner:Machine Gun+
keywords.description:
Magazine capacity: 12.
Base damage: 5.

keywords.name: Bladegunner:Non-shooting Attack
keywords.description: Non-shooting Attack are Attack cards that doesn't contains Shoot in description. They don't use ammo and aren't affected by Jam.

keywords.name: Bladegunner:Sticky Bullet
keywords.description: At the end of enemies' turn, deal 3 additional damage and apply half amount of Burning.

keywords.name: Bladegunner:burning
keywords.description: Take additional damage from Attacks until end of turn, in which damage value is equal to stack amount.

keywords.name: Bladegunner:detonate
keywords.description: Trigger effect of Sticky bullets on target. Deal damage and apply same amount of Burning instead.
